attributes.action: instruct employers to stop asking for previous expereince and train young people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am 17 years old and have recently been medically discharged from the army. Im now left looking for a job but there all asking for previous experience, how can a 17 year old straight out of school get previous experience. Why arent the so called big companies taking young people on like myself and training us to do the job instead of getting people with experience. No wonder the "hoodie culture" turn to anti social behaviour.
